desc: Massively boosts Def when HP is full

dictionary.lore: A group of alchemists is said to have believed in the spirits of the world. One of them, Grinsel, claimed to have created a lens that collected these spirits. When a person in perfect health holds this shield-like lens, it is said that a barrier is created on the spot, blocking any interference from the outside world. However, no one has been able to decipher the connection between that phenomenon and the spirits of the world.

name: Lens Shield
